metadata.name: Renamed Mavinject.EXE Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of a renamed version of the "Mavinject" process. Which can be abused to perform process injection using the "/INJECTRUNNING" flag

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('mavinject32\.exe', 'mavinject64\.exe')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\mavinject32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\mavinject64.exe'))))

output.summary: Detects the execution of a renamed version of the "Mavinject" process. Which can be abused to perform process injection using the "/INJECTRUNNING" flag
